title: Free Mastery 7??
body:
HI,

First off I`d like to say that with this issue/bug Im not sure if the alpha client is related but I remember reading something about the loot system being buggy.

Anyway here's what happened TD;DR I got mastery 7 morgana for free, as in I still have 3 mastery keys in my loot.

Long story : I was mainly using the alpha client but had to switch since URF was coming out and to my knowledge game modes like URF don`t show up in alpha. Though when I signed in to the normal client I got the animation showing I got her mastery 7.

[Proof 1](http://prntscr.com/cldrkh)
[Proof 2](http://prntscr.com/cldrnq)

Is this known?

Thanks
